ApplicationFrame - Class in PayrollSystem
Represents the Applications main GUI JFrame.

Creates the Application's main JFrame by adding the JPanels InfoPanel, InputPanel, OutputPanel, ControlPanel to this Application's main JFrame.

getOvertimePay(double, double) - Static method in class PayrollSystem.MathHelper
Calculates overtimePay, time and a half, which is 0.0 if hoursWorked <= 40.0.
getOvertimePayLabel() - Method in class PayrollSystem.OutputPanel
 
getRegularPay(double, double) - Static method in class PayrollSystem.MathHelper
Calculates regularPay which is hoursWorked * hourlyPay but up to hoursWorked <= 40.0.
